website_summaries.verdict: Once you find the right shade, it's a good cream foundation for anyone with imperfections that are hard to cover. Oil-free formula is great for blemish-prone skin.
pros: Moisturizes and provides moderate to full coverage for problematic skin issues, such as rosacea
Has a smooth texture that blends well
Oil-free and works well for nearly any type of skin
cons: Finding the correct color is a bit challenging, as some shades look a bit darker once applied

customer_reviews.title: The best foundation
customer_reviews.text: I looked for years for a good product that covered my face but didn't look too caked on. This product is the one. It barely looks like you have foundation on but it covers all of the little spots and gives you a beautiful glow. A little bit covers a lot so you don't have to put a ton of makeup on.
customer_reviews.author: San Francisco Diva

customer_reviews.title: It will do...but found something I like more.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice foundation but I'm not sure it is as wonderful as all the hype says it is....I mean it's nice, goes on easily and covers well but I don't find it any different than my Estee Lauder Double Wear or my Mac foundation. I did find the color I picked out way too YELLOW. I got the bamboo beige and would definitely choose a different color next time. I doubt I'll rebuy it though. I just found one I like MUCH better and it's nowhere near the price. It's called Bella Mari...all natural and is so moisturizing...best for normal to dry skin though.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Grace

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed and spilling out- appeared used/ returned

product_meta.title: Laura Mercier Silk Creme Oil Free Photo Edition Foundation, Cashew Beige, 1 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Color:Cashew BeigeHigh pigment, high performance, oil-free foundation creates a flawless canvas that lasts up to 12 hours. Makeup artists love how it feels comfortable on skin while hiding even hard-to-cover imperfections. Designed for normal to oily skin. Smooths skin texture and visibly evens skin tone. Color-true pigments virtually disappear on skin for smooth, even application and blending.

THE STORY OF LAURA MERCIER
Laura Mercier is a world-renowned makeup artist and creator of such cosmetic products as Laura Mercier Makeup, Laura Mercier Skin Care, and Laura Mercier Fragrances.
feature_bullets: Creates a flawless, comfortable canvas that lasts up to 12 hours.
This is a long lasting foundation that remains comfortable on skin.
